original_text: A priest happened to be going down the same road, and when he saw the man, he passed by on the other side.
korean_text: 마침 한 제사장이 그 길로 내려가다가 그를 보고 피하여 지나가고

sentences.original_text: A priest happened to be going down the same road
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 제사장이 마침 같은 길을 내려가고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and when he saw the man
he passed by on the other side
